main event: A person in Pound Ridge, New York sighted a metallic disc-shaped object that traveled in a south-southeast direction and crossed about 50 degrees of arc in approximately 8 seconds.
interesting points: The object had a metallic, disc-shaped appearance and appeared to be reflecting light.
The object traveled at a constant speed and crossed a large portion of the sky in a short time.
No other witnesses reported seeing the object, and no meteors or unusual astronomical events were reported for that time period.
Weather conditions in the area were overcast, which could have contributed to the sighting.
The observer stated he had been photographing UFO phenomena for many years.
